dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and magic.

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a legendary sword hidden deep within these woods. I aim to find it.

dialogues.speaker: Arin the Bold
dialogues.text: Ah, you're referring to the fabled Sword of Light? Many have attempted to claim it before, but none have succeeded.

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: I'm not afraid of a challenge. Will you join me on this quest, Arin?
